abstract: A new service says it will pay for your new iPhone if you hand over your old one. But there are better deals to be had elsewhere, thanks to unusually strong demand for the used phones.
snippet: A new service says it will pay for your new iPhone if you hand over your old one. But there are better deals to be had elsewhere, thanks to unusually strong demand for the used phones.
lead_paragraph: I was walking by the lengthy iPhone line outside the Apple Store in Soho on Sunday when I heard someone call out: “Turn in your old iPhone and get the new one free!”

headline.main: There’s Lots of Money in Those Old iPhones
